## detectBackgroundMode() function

Detect appearance mode from terminal background luminance.

This is a cross-platform approach that works in any terminal that supports OSC queries. It determines light/dark based on the actual terminal background color rather than system settings.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function detectBackgroundMode(options?: DetectBackgroundModeOptions): Promise<AppearanceResult>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[AppearanceResult](./chromaterm.appearanceresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;

'light' if luminance exceeds threshold, 'dark' otherwise, 'unknown' if probe fails
